elements.label: Crewmember
elements.description: One of the sparks of life that animate my vessel.

elements.label: Exhausted
elements.description: What is depleted now, may be renewed when the tide turns.

elements.label: Recruitment Opportunity
elements.description: A potential new member for my crew.

elements.label: Price
elements.description: True loyalty is priceless, but for sailors, any negotiation starts with shining sterling.

elements.label: Longing for Home
elements.description: Thoughts of home, thoughts of warm hearths or thoughts of smiling children, eventually they pull on sailors as strongly as the sea, or as their contract.

elements.label: Wants to Leave
elements.description: This one expressed their will to leave my ship.

elements.label: Bargained With
elements.description: I've already bargained with this crewmember to convince them to stay with on board. The next time they decide to leave, it will be harder to convince them again.
